getVehicleOwner(bytes32).notice: Gets the current owner of a vehicle.

registerVehicle(bytes32,uint256).notice: Registers a new vehicle, anchoring it on-chain.

transferVehicle(bytes32,address,uint256).notice: Transfers ownership of a vehicle to a new address.
